import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, Container } from 'reactstrap' import thumbnailIcon from '../../assets/placeholder_thumbnail.png' const EventsPage = () => { const user_id = localStorage.getItem('user') console.log(user_id) // Declare state variables: const [title, setTitle] = useState('') const [description, setDescription] = useState('') const [category, setCategory] = useState('') const [price, setPrice] = useState('') const [thumbnail, setThumbnail] = useState(null) const [date, setDate] = useState('') const submitHandler = () => { return '' } return (

setThumbnail(event.target.files[0])} /> setTitle(event.target.value)} /> setCategory(event.target.value)} /> setDescription(event.target.value)} /> setPrice(event.target.value)} /> setDate(event.target.value)} />
) } export default EventsPage
